output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present, indicating this is electoral material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" as presidential candidate and Gabriel Ghilea as senate candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - it's a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions).
4. Electoral objective: Yes - explicitly calls for votes: - "Susține-ne duminica aceasta, votând Marcel Ciolacu președinte!" - "în 1 decembrie votează Gabriel Ghilea senator!"
5. Journalism: No - this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No - this is a structured campaign message with clear electoral objectives.
The post is problematic because: - It explicitly promotes Marcel Ciolacu for president after the campaign period ended - Contains direct call to vote for a presidential candidate - Has significant reach through paid promotion - Uses official campaign material markers (CMF number)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains explicit call to vote for a specific presidential candidate - Uses official campaign material identification (CMF) - Is being actively promoted after campaign period - Has clear electoral messaging and objectives - Addresses wide audience through paid promotion
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID: 386986527742462) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul contine indemnuri directe la vot pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu ("Susține-ne duminica aceasta, votând Marcel Ciolacu președinte!"), fiind distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact semnificativ (10.000-14.999 afisari). Materialul este marcat oficial ca propaganda electorala prin numarul CMF 11240017, confirmand astfel natura sa de comunicare electorala, si are ca obiectiv clar influentarea votului pentru alegerile prezidentiale prin promovarea activa a unui candidat specific.
